examples.example: 在前进的道路上，我们遇到了一堵看似难以逾越的高墙，但大家齐心协力，最终成功跨越了它。

translate.english: On the way forward, we encountered a seemingly insurmountable high wall, but everyone worked together and finally succeeded in crossing it.

examples.example: 远处有一堵古老的城墙，见证着岁月的沧桑变迁。

translate.english: There is an ancient city wall in the distance, witnessing the vicissitudes of the years.

examples.example: 我在山间漫步，忽然看到前方有一堵开满鲜花的矮墙，美丽极了。

translate.english: I was strolling in the mountains and suddenly saw a low wall full of blooming flowers in front of me, which was extremely beautiful.
